MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA11 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Higher Lane and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:02PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:10PM on 20th October 2020.
